src:
PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA (sreda): Realno je da Zvezda i Totenhem proguraju GG, Bajern “nakanta” Olimpijakos, a Siti odnese bodove iz Milana
Pročitajte nekoliko predloga za 6. novembar...

06 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA novinari portala MOZZART Sport iznose svoje mišljenje povodom utakmica koje se igraju tog dana, i daju svoje viđenje koji bi ishod mogao da bude postignut na određenim parovima.

Šta vi mislite? Imate li svoje ideje, predloge, fikseve... koje biste podelili s drugima?


Ostavite svoj komentar ispod teksta...

Fiksevi dana
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498972
21:00 | Crvena zvezda - Totenhem
Nije lako osvojiti sva tri boda na Zvezdinom terenu, ali nije lako ni prevazići psihološki pritisak koji nameće poraz od 5:0 u utakmici koju su ove dve ekipe odigrale u Londonu. Gosti i dalje ne blistaju, u nedelju su izvukli samo 1:1 sa Evertonom, pa nam GG deluje najrealnije.
Oba tima daju gol: ggKvota: 1.72Fiksevi dana
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498924
18:55 | Lokomotiva Moskva - Juventus
Lokomotiva je dugo vodila u Torinu, ali je u poslednjih petnaestak minuta meča popustila i ostala bez ijednog boda. Moskovljani su i kod kuće odigrali nekoliko razočaravajućih partija, te iako Juventus ne blista (poslednjih nedelja mučio se u Seriji A) pripada mu uloga favorita.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 1.65Fiksevi dana
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498927
21:00 | Atalanta - Mančester Siti
Debitant Atalanta do sada se nije proslavila u ovom takmičenju (sva tri poraza), ali ne zaboravite da je u pitanju ekipa koja pruža odlične partije u Seriji A, posebno na svom terenu. To ne znači da Siti neće slaviti i u ovom okršaju u Milanu, naprotiv, ali i GG je realno.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 1.55Fiksevi dana
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498921
18:55 | Bajern - Olimpijakos
Bajern je dobio svih pet okršaja sa Olimpijakosom, mada nedavno u Pireju nije baš tako lako došao do bodova. Naravno, u Minhenu bi trebalo da bude sasvim druga priča i u keca ne sumnjamo, bez obzira na to što je Bajern otpustio Nika Kovača, a verujemo i u kombinaciju 1-1&3+.
Mozzart kombinazzije: 1-1&3+Kvota: 1.62Vredi probati
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498926
21:00 | Dinamo Zagreb - Šahtjor
Dinamo nas je u nekoliko navrata prijatno iznenadio (pobedom nad Atalantom i remijem u prvoj utakmici sa Šahtjorom) i ima razloga da se nada trijumfu. Istina, iskusni Ukrajinci sigurno su naučili lekciju, međutim, čini nam se da vredi rizikovati sa kecom. Kvota je sjajna.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 2.55Vredi probati
LIGA ŠAMPIONA ID: 4498923
21:00 | Leverkuzen - Atletiko Madrid
Ukoliko Atletiko ovde pobedi, a Lokomotiva izgubi, Jorgandžije će osigurati plasman u osminu finala LŠ, što je ogroman motiv da daju sve od sebe. No, sve osim trijumfa eliminisaće domaće, tako da i oni imaju razloga da zapnu. Zato ne bi bilo loše da se opredelite za GG3+.
Oba tima daju gol: gg3+Kvota: 2.45Vredi probati
LIGA EVROPE ID: 4499084
16:50 | Gimarais - Arsenal
 
Za razliku od domaćih, ovo je jedino takmičenje u kojem Arsenal gura po planu. Međutim, sve jače glasine o smeni menadžera Unaja Emerija jedino mogu da odmognu Tobdžijama, a nas dovode u dilemu da li da vam preporučimo dvojku. No, kvalitet gostiju trebalo bi da prevagne.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 2.15Za izbegavanje
CRNA GORA - KUP ID: 4502468
14:00 | OFK Titograd - Petrovac
U pitanju je prva utakmica četvrtfinala crnogorskog Kupa, ali iako je na prvenstvenoj tabeli domaćin bolje plasiran, nismo sigurni u to da će ovde doći kec. Naime, Petrovac je u poslednje vreme u usponu forme, a ume da odoli na ovom gostovanju. Bolje je da ih preskočite.
Konačan ishod: 1Kvota: 1.82
text:
SUGGESTIONS AND TIPPING (Wednesday): It's realistic for Star and Tottenham to push GG, Bayern "nakanta" Olympiakos, and City take points from Milan
Read some suggestions for November 6th ...

06 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section, MOZZART Sport reporters give their opinions on the matches played that day, and give their views on what outcome could be achieved in certain pairs.

What do you think? Do you have any ideas, suggestions, fixes ... to share with others?


Leave your comment below ...

Fixes of the day
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498972
21:00 | Red Star - Tottenham
It is not easy to score all three points on Starfield, but it is not easy to overcome the psychological pressure imposed by a 5-0 defeat in a game played by the two teams in London. The guests still don't shine, they only pulled 1-1 with Everton on Sunday, so GG seems most realistic to us.
Both teams score: ggQuota: 1.72Pixels of the day
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498924
18:55 | Lokomotiva Moscow - Juventus
The locomotive led for a long time in Turin, but in the last fifteen minutes of the match relented and lost no points. The Muscovites have played several disappointing games at home as well, and though Juventus has not shone (struggling in Serie A in recent weeks), it has been favored.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 1.65Fixed Days
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498927
21:00 | Atalanta - Manchester City
The Atalanta debutant has not celebrated in this competition so far (all three defeats), but do not forget that this is a team that provides excellent Serie A games, especially in their own field. This does not mean that City will not celebrate in this clash in Milan, on the contrary, but GG is also realistic.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 1.55Fixed Days
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498921
18:55 | Bayern - Olympiacos
Bayern have won all five fights with Olympiakos, though not so easily in Piraeus. Of course, there should be a completely different story in Munich, and we have no doubt about it, regardless of Bayern firing Nick Kovac, and we believe in a 1-1 & 3 + combination.
Mozzart Combinations: 1-1 & 3 + Odds: 1.62Worth to try
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498926
21:00 | Dinamo Zagreb - Shakhtar
Dinamo has pleasantly surprised us on several occasions (with a win over Atalanta and a draw in the first game with Shakhtar) and there is reason to hope for triumph. True, experienced Ukrainians have certainly learned the lesson, however, it seems to us that it is worth the risk with an ace. Odds are great.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 2.55Worth to try
CHAMPION LEAGUE ID: 4498923
21:00 | Leverkusen - Atletico Madrid
If Atletico wins here and Lokomotiv loses, Georgian will secure a place in the eighth finals of the LS, which is a huge motive to do their best. But all but the triumphs will eliminate the domestic ones, so they too have reason to stumble. So it wouldn't be a bad idea to opt for GG3 +.
Both teams score: gg3 + Odds: 2.45Worth to try
Europa League ID: 4499084
16:50 | Gimarais - Arsenal

Unlike the locals, this is the only competition in which Arsenal are pushing for it. However, the growing rumors about the dismissal of Unaj Emery's manager can only deflect the Tudji, and we are left in a dilemma as to whether to recommend you two. But the quality of the guests should outweigh.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 2.15To avoid
MONTENEGRO - CUP ID: 4502468
14:00 | OFK Titograd - Petrovac
This is the first game of the quarterfinals of the Montenegrin Cup, but although the host table is better placed, we are not sure that an ace will come here. Namely, Petrovac has been on the rise lately, and can resist this guest appearance. It is better to skip them.
Final Outcome: 1Quotes: 1.82
